name: Strawberry and Sesame Swirl Soft Serve
description: Strawberries and cream get a double dose of sesame from tahini and halvah. The tahini adds richness, and the slightly salty halvah has a cookie-dough effect: Everyone will mine for it. Eat it quickly before it melts, ideally with extra halvah on standby.
recipeCategory: easy, quick, ice creams and sorbets, dessert
keywords: frozen strawberries, greek yogurt, halvah, tahini, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup full-fat Greek yogurt or labneh
1/4 cup sesame halvah (about 2 ounces), plus more for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Place the strawberries, yogurt, cream, tahini and sugar in a blender or food processor, and blitz, scraping down the sides as needed, until smooth.
Crumble the halvah on top and stir through to distribute. Serve in chilled glasses with more halvah crumbled on top. Eat quickly.
